TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit DataControlExtensions extends System.Object
public ref class DataControlExtensions abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供 ASP.NET Dynamic Data 所使用的擴充方法。

span.span: Provides extension methods that are used by ASP.NET Dynamic Data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別用來啟用 ASP.NET 資料繫結控制項中的動態資料功能。The class is used to enable Dynamic Data features in ASP.NET data-bound controls. ## Examples 如需如何啟用資料繫結控制項中的動態資料功能的範例，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 啟用 ASP.NET 資料繫結控制項中的動態資料](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c170c9df-54f2-4fee-ad9f-33f2a882928f)。For an example of how to enable Dynamic Data features in a data-bound control, see [Walkthrough: Enabling Dynamic Data in ASP.NET Data-Bound Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c170c9df-54f2-4fee-ad9f-33f2a882928f).

related.span: 擴充方法 (C# 程式設計手冊)

summary.span: 針對指定的資料控制項啟用動態資料行為。

span.span: Enables Dynamic Data behavior for the specified data control.
